name: Account
title: Account
description: A financial tool for tracking value accrued for a particular purpose. In the healthcare field, used to track charges for a patient, cost centers, etc.

elements.name: Account
elements.description: A financial tool for tracking value accrued for a particular purpose.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Unique identifier used to reference the account.

elements.name: status
elements.description: Indicates whether the account is presently used/usable or not.

elements.name: type
elements.description: Categorizes the account for reporting and searching purposes.

elements.name: name
elements.description: Name used for the account when displaying it to humans in reports, etc.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: Identifies the entity which incurs the expenses. While the immediate recipients of services or goods might be entities related to the subject, the expenses were ultimately incurred by the subject of the Account.

elements.name: servicePeriod
elements.description: The date range of services associated with this account.

elements.name: coverage
elements.description: The party(s) that are responsible for covering the payment of this account, and what order should they be applied to the account.

elements.name: owner
elements.description: Indicates the service area, hospital, department, etc. with responsibility for managing the Account.

elements.name: description
elements.description: Provides additional information about what the account tracks and how it is used.

elements.name: guarantor
elements.description: The parties responsible for balancing the account if other payment options fall short.
